extends utam.core.framework.base.BasePageObject
implements Card
    Selector: lightning-card Represents the lightning-card Lightning web component. Get footer text, body text, title text or check if it's a narrow card. , created from JSON resources/utam/lightning/card.utam.json
    Version:
    1.2.0
    Author:
